title: Comparison Table
description: Marketing-optimized table for comparing plans, products, or features with pricing psychology principles

metadata.description: Table component for comparing features, plans, or products side-by-side. Implements pricing psychology principles (anchoring, highlighting, visual hierarchy). Perfect for pricing pages, product comparisons, and feature matrices. Responsive with horizontal scroll on mobile and full table layout on desktop.

accessibility.focusManagement: Entire table container is focusable for keyboard scrolling. Plan CTAs are keyboard accessible. Header rows use scope='col', feature rows use scope='row' for proper table semantics.

keyboardShortcuts.action: Navigate between CTA buttons in plan columns

usageExamples.title: SaaS Pricing Table (3 Plans)
usageExamples.description: Classic Goldilocks pricing with highlighted middle option. Drives 60%+ to recommended plan.

usageExamples.title: Product Comparison (2 Columns)
usageExamples.description: Side-by-side comparison of two products or competitors. Highlights key differentiators.

usageExamples.title: Feature Matrix (4+ Columns)
usageExamples.description: Comprehensive feature comparison across multiple plans. Good for detailed decision support.

usageExamples.title: Anchored Pricing (Highest First)
usageExamples.description: Shows most expensive plan first to anchor perception. Makes mid-tier seem reasonable.

usageExamples.title: Competitor Comparison Matrix
usageExamples.description: Compare your product against 2-3 competitors. Highlights your advantages.

usageExamples.title: Mobile Cards Layout
usageExamples.description: Responsive variant that stacks columns as cards on mobile devices.

usageExamples.title: Minimal Variant
usageExamples.description: Clean, borderless design for modern aesthetic.

columns.description: Array of column objects representing plans, products, or comparison subjects

subtitle.description: Optional subtitle below title (e.g., 'For individuals', 'For teams')

highlighted.description: Whether this column is highlighted as recommended/popular

badge.description: Badge text for highlighted columns (e.g., 'Most Popular', 'Best Value')

variant.description: Button variant (defaults to 'primary' for highlighted columns)

rows.description: Array of feature row objects or category headers

category.description: Category name (creates header row spanning all columns)

values.description: Array of values for each column (must match number of columns)

tooltip.description: Optional tooltip text explaining the feature

responsive.description: Mobile behavior: 'scroll' for horizontal scrolling, 'cards' for stacked cards

id.description: Unique identifier for the component instance

caption.description: Table caption providing context (e.g., 'Pricing plan comparison')
